GPS Tracking: Install GPS tracking technology on the bicycle to allow users to track their routes, monitor their speed, and locate their bike in case of theft.
Eco Mode: Develop an eco mode feature that uses regenerative braking to convert kinetic energy back into electrical energy, allowing the bicycle to recharge its battery on the go.
Integrated Lighting: Incorporate integrated lighting systems that can be controlled via a mobile app, providing adjustable lighting for increased visibility and safety.
Voice Assistant Integration: Partner with a popular voice assistant to enable users to control their bicycles using voice commands, adding a new level of convenience and hands-free functionality.
Smart Seat: Develop a smart seat that adjusts to the rider's weight and height, providing optimal comfort and support during the ride.
